Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd love to go shield surfing with a
<clr:0000>Hylian shield<clr:ffff>, just once.

Yeah, I'd be trying to get my hands on it
tooâ€”if it wasn't in <clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>, up
there in the sky.
Talk22:
<snd:Notice>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Hmmm? <sp:5:1:0>That's not what I think it is,
right? <sp:5:0:0>Is that seriously the <clr:0000>Hylian shield<clr:ffff>?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>What are YOU doing walking around with
a legendary shield?!<sp:0:4:0>Don't tell me you got it in <clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>.
That place is too high up off the ground
to get into!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How's it going with the shield surfing?


Bust a shield yet?<sp:5:0:0> If you do, feel free
to use any of the shields here.

Oops. Hang on.<sp:5:0:0> I don't mean free-free.
You still gotta pay for 'em. Sorry.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I see what you're carrying. <sp:5:1:0>Man, I wish that thing
was mine...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you bust your shield, feel free to use
one of the shields right here.

And I'll feel free to charge ya a price!<sp:5:1:0>
Gotta pay Coach for my lessons...
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>All the shields here are good to go,
specially for rookies.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Try 'em out!<sp:5:1:0> Fair prices all around.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh, OK.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, ya know where to find me if you ever
need a shield.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, that was pretty rad work before,
rescuing our coach, Selmie.<sp:0:4:0>I bet she'd show ya how to shred the
slopes on a shield. Like, give you
challenges. Teach you what's what.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And if ya go shield surfing and your
shield breaks, no problem. Come back
to the cabin here.
I'll give ya my very own shield, totally
for free...<sp:5:1:0> Ha! You wish!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Can't thank ya enough for rescuing
Coach. You and me, we gotta push each
other to learn it all.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Looks like your pouch is full. Can't
hand the shield over like this. Stop by
once you've made space.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ask our coach, Selmie. She'll get ya
right into a practice challenge.

If all that sliding busts your shield, come
back to the cabin here.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll give ya one of my spare shields.
But ya know, not for free.
Com_Talk_50c:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Sturdier shield there. That means it'll
stand up to sliding for a longer time,
even if slopes aren't snowy.
It's a little steep at <clr:0000><sp:2:12:2c:2600530068006f0070005f00540072006100640065004900740065006d0050007200690063006500ffff00cd> <sp:c9:6:1c:0a00720075007000650065000c007200750070006500650073000000><clr:ffff>, but
worth it. So, want to buy it?
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks, man. Enjoy the slopes!


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Coach is in the cabin, so talk to her if
you want to get sliding, yeah?
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This one's for sale, so can you please not
walk all over it?
Talk22_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>I dunno how you got your hands on it,
but I do know that shield is supposed to
be incredible for surfing!
<snd:Happy>Can't blame you for parading it around.<sp:5:1:0>
I'd do the same in your shoes!
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, shield surfer! Sorry, but I've run
out of shields to sell ya.

But the good news is there's a whole
world of shields out there. And some
GREAT ones for surfing too.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Like, uh...<sp:5:1:0> Oh yeah!<sp:5:0:0> The <clr:0000>Hylian shield<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>That's the shield we ALL want.
Legendary! Heard of it?

<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's tougher than other shields. Takes a
beating on the slopes, no matter how
harsh the terrain. Lasts a long time.
Oh yeah, a real beauty as well!


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>They say that shield is somewhere inside
<clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>, but...<sp:5:1:0>it's up in the sky
these days.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Guess that's just going to stay where it
is then, right? Bummer.
